duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with clients' target audience on social media (mainly Instagram, Twitter, Linkedin & TikTok)
Like posts, leave meaningful comments, engage with stories, respond to direct messages, search relative hashtags for target audience
Provide monthly reports demonstrating account growth and ensuring the target audience follows the client
Deep understanding of communication and what leads to follower growth through account comments

education_certification.credential: High School or College Student majoring in Marketing, Business, Advertising, Journalism, PR, English, Writing
